title: Computer freeze after the game start How to fix it
body: My computer freeze  every time after the game start. There aren't any problem on the other game. How to fix it ???

replies.body:
I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)

A recent Windows 10 update has been causing an issue with how the Xbox game bar is interacting with league, and resulting in a freeze for some players.  Disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) should get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
same here, did it happen to u right after the window 10 update
